body_html:
This is a known issue. We've decided to keep Estimator free of state -- please use contrib/predictor to get that behavior.

For most cases, you can pass a generator as input. As long as the generator yields new input, the model is kept in memory.
body_text:
This is a known issue. We've decided to keep Estimator free of state -- please use contrib/predictor to get that behavior.
For most cases, you can pass a generator as input. As long as the generator yields new input, the model is kept in memory.
body:
This is a known issue. We've decided to keep Estimator free of state -- please use contrib/predictor to get that behavior.

For most cases, you can pass a generator as input. As long as the generator yields new input, the model is kept in memory.
